input.sentences: the whole family was gathered for my grandfather 's birthday .
after the surprise | he did what he did best- tell us stories .
he may be older | but he is still popular and well liked by everyone .
he is very outgoing and loves his family .
this is all of us together . what a wonderful night .
output.sentences: August 12th, it was our grandfathers birthday, we gathered our family to throw in a party
Our papa loves to surprise us with stories.
He becomes really popular in his party.
He is outgoing and he loves his family very much.
We took a family photo to remember the wonderful night we had with him.
